title: This Kitchen
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 18 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Help students begin to identify common objects in a kitchen in the book This Kitchen. Colorful photographs, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and supporting details as well as to connect to prior knowledge.
meta: cookie jar, counter, cupboard, fridge, sink, stove, toaster, trash can
Main Idea and Details : Determine the main idea and supporting details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /c/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this
